text: qalu: 'iinama ant- ya sheyb- min aladhin 'asabahum alsihr 'iisabat shdydt, fdhhb beqwlhm, wama 'ant 'iilaa wahid mithlina fi albshryt, fkyf tkhts dunina balrsal? wa'iin 'akbar zananaa 'anak min alkadhibin fima tddaeyh min alrsal. fa'iin kunt sadqana fi daewaa alnbwt, fade allah 'an yasqut ealayna qate eadhab min alsama' tstaslna
